alert.note: Alert for Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 21 at 10:40AM EST until further notice by NWS Key West
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by a combination of rainfall on top of ongoing coastal flooding. * WHERE...The Upper Keys, especially Bayside communities * WHEN...Until 1230 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1032 AM EST, National Weather Service Meteorologist detected moderate to heavy rain due to rain with embedded showers moving towards the Upper Keys. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 1.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will compound existing flooding brought about due to coastal flooding occurring along the Bayside communities. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Key Largo, Jewfish Creek Bridge, Plantation, Rock Harbor, Windley Key, Route 1/card Sound, Route 1/card Sound Road Split, Upper Matecumbe Key, Teatable Key and Lower Matecumbe Key. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Do not drive your vehicle into areas where the water covers the roadway. The water depth may be too great to allow your car to cross safely.
